words.source: H3381 (יָרַד, 'to go down/descend'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'came down', ESV 'came down', NASB 'came down' — all agree
H1323 (בַּת, 'daughter'), HNcfsc (noun-common-feminine-singular-construct); KJV 'the daughter of', ESV 'The daughter of', NASB 'The daughter of' — all agree
H6547 (פַּרְעֹה, 'Pharaoh'), HNp (proper-noun); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh'
H7364 (רָחַץ, 'to wash/bathe'), HR/Vqc (preposition-lamed/Qal-infinitive-construct); KJV 'to wash herself', ESV 'to bathe', NASB 'to bathe' — all agree
H5921 (עַל, 'upon/over/at'), HR (preposition); KJV 'at', ESV 'at', NASB 'at' — all agree
H2975 (יְאֹר, 'river/Nile'), HTd/Np (article/proper-noun); KJV 'the river', ESV 'the river', NASB 'the Nile' — all refer to the Nile
H5291 (נַעֲרָה, 'young woman/maidservant'), HC/Ncfpc/Sp3fs (conjunctive/noun-common-feminine-plural-construct/suffix-3fs); KJV 'her maidens', ESV 'her young women', NASB 'her attendants'
H1980 (הָלַךְ, 'to walk/go'), HVqrfpa (Qal-participle-feminine-plural-absolute); KJV 'walked', ESV 'walked', NASB 'were walking' — all agree
H5921 (עַל, 'upon/over/along'), HR (preposition); KJV 'along by', ESV 'beside', NASB 'beside' — all convey proximity
H3027 (יָד, 'hand/side'), HNcbsc (noun-common-both-singular-construct); idiom for 'bank/side of a river'; KJV 'the river's side', ESV 'the riverside', NASB 'the bank of'
H2975 (יְאֹר, 'river/Nile'), HTd/Np (article/proper-noun); KJV 'the river', ESV 'the river', NASB 'the Nile'
H7200 (רָאָה, 'to see'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'she saw', ESV 'She saw', NASB 'she saw' — all agree
H853 (אֵת), HTo (particle-direct-object-marker); untranslated in English
H8392 (תֵּבָה, 'ark/chest/basket'), HTd/Ncfsa (article/noun-common-feminine-singular-absolute); same word as Noah's ark; KJV 'the ark', ESV 'the basket', NASB 'the basket'
H8432 (תָּוֶךְ, 'midst/middle'), HR/Ncmsc (preposition-beth/noun-common-masculine-singular-construct); KJV 'among', ESV 'among', NASB 'among' — all agree
H5488 (סוּף, 'reed/rush'), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'the flags', ESV 'the reeds', NASB 'the reeds'
H7971 (שָׁלַח, 'to send'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'she sent', ESV 'She sent', NASB 'she sent' — all agree
H853 (אֵת), HTo (particle-direct-object-marker); untranslated in English

H519 (אָמָה, 'maidservant' or אַמָּה 'forearm/cubit'), HNcfsc/Sp3fs (noun-common-feminine-singular-construct/suffix-3fs); DIVERGENT: KJV 'her maid', ESV 'her servant', NASB 'her maid' — but some scholars read אַמָּתָהּ as 'her arm/hand' (from אַמָּה = cubit/forearm), meaning she reached out her own arm rather than sending a servant
H3947 (לָקַח, 'to take'), HC/Vqw3fs/Sp3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs/suffix-3fs); KJV 'took it', ESV 'took it', NASB 'took it' — all agree
